about_the_game:
Timeloop Titans

Timeloop Titans is a thrilling space arcade shooter that takes you into the heart of an intergalactic war! Dive into a retro-inspired adventure with modern twists as you battle endless waves of enemies determined to annihilate Planet Gaia. Do you have what it takes to save humanity?

Key Features

  • Dynamic Space Action

    • Face relentless waves of enemies in fast-paced, adrenaline-fueled gameplay.

  • Upgrades and Power-ups

    • Enhance your starship with powerful upgrades and discover rare bonuses to gain the upper hand.

  • Epic Galactic Storyline

    • Protect Planet Gaia, the "Sapphire of the Cosmos," and uncover its mysterious history.

  • Multiple Difficulty Modes

    • Play your way with settings for casual players or hardcore veterans.

  • Steam Leaderboards

    • Compete with other players and claim your spot as the Galaxy's greatest pilot.

Design and Graphics

  • Retro-inspired pixel art with a vibrant, modern flair.

  • Stunning cosmic landscapes and uniquely designed ships bring the universe to life.

Leave Your Mark in History

Step into the role of Captain Nova, humanity's last hope, and lead the charge against alien invaders. Replay levels, perfect your skills, and rise to the top of the leaderboards in this action-packed space adventure!

name: Timeloop Titans

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Timeloop Titans is a fast-paced space arcade shooter where you defend the breathtaking Planet Gaia from relentless alien invasions. Upgrade your ship, conquer challenges, and save humanity in this cosmic battle for survival!
